497520.name: Virtual Battlemap DLC - Landscapes Pack
497520.description:
Build a world of beautiful but dangerous landscapes for your players and the monsters that challenge them. From a simple stream to a tornado threatening the very cabin the players are sleeping in, your options are endless. Deserts, Plains, Lava Fields, Swamps, Cities, Forests, Tree Villages, Mountains and many more.. you choose where the adventure happens and exactly what your players experience! Mix Landscapes with the core dungeons to make millions of new maps! You can even mix Landscapes with all other DLC for unlimited map making power!


  • Over 500 new map building assets (Nearly Doubling the core Assets!)
  • 5 new panels FULL of Landscpe building content
  • 20 Different Terrain Types
  • Real Water, Water Falls, Rivers
  • Weather, Clouds, Wind
  • Backdrop Mountains
  • New Particle Effects
